loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, rice, cakes, flour and other items.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
Dolores es un hombre de 43 años de edad, es casado con una familia de 8 hijos de las edades entre  1 y  23 años, está linda familia vive en una comunidad de Santo Tomas Al Unión.
Dolores para obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a sus hijos se dedica  a la albañilería desde hace 20 años, gracias a sus años de experiencia mucha gente lo busca para prestar de sus servicios.
Dolores con grandes aspiraciones en la vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para la apertura de una tienda de abarrotes con el crédito comprara productos como: azúcar, gaseosas, jugos y gaseosas. Esto con el fin de contar con otra fuente de ingresos. Sus aspiraciones en la vida es fortalecer su negocio, tener su propio local y mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Dolores is a 43 year old man. He is married and has a family with 8 children between the ages of 1 and 23. This beautiful family lives in a community in Santo Tomas Al Unión.

In order to obtain his income and to get his children ahead, Dolores has worked as a brick layer for 20 years. Many people seek him out to buy his services thanks to his many years of experience.

With great aspirations in life, Dolores has made the decision to request a loan to open a grocery store. With the loan he will purchase products like: sugar, soft drinks, and juices in order to have another source of income. His aspirations in life are to strengthen his business, have his own shop and to increase his income.

loans.use: to buy grocery store items like: sugar, soft drinks and juices.

loans.name: Raul

texts.es:
Raul continúa con su negocio de elaboración de muebles. El crédito que obtuvo lo invirtió comprando herramientas de trabajo como sierras, clavos, amoladora, etc., el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque el comercio en su negocio es constante. Actualmente su negocio cuenta con variedad de muebles como sillones, sillas, banquetas y otros, “mi mueblería no tiene problemas de ventas, sólo nos falta capital de trabajo…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que trabaja independientemente, la desventaja es la época de lluvias porque las ventas son al aire libre. Su sueño es abrir una tienda de muebles, él desea comprar tela tapiz por rollo para forrar muebles. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 10 años que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Raul solicita un préstamo para comprar tapiz por rollo para forrar muebles.
texts.en:
Raul continues with his business making furniture. The loan that he received was invested into buying work tools such as saws, nails, a grinder, etc. His payments were on time because the trade in his business is continuous. Currently, his business has a variety of furniture such as armchairs, chairs, stools and others. "My furniture stall does not have any problem with sales, we only lack working capital..." he says.

The advantage of his business is that he works independently. The disadvantage is the rainy season because his sales are out in the open. His dream is to open a furniture store. He wants to buy rolls of wallpaper to cover furniture. This is the 2nd loan with the institution in the 10 years that he has been doing this job. It is for those reasons that Raul is asking for a loan to buy rolls of wallpaper to cover furniture.

loans.use: to buy rolls of wallpaper to cover furniture.

loans.name: Bunafsha

texts.en:
Bunafsha is a careful mother of four children. She is a kind and hardworking woman. Bunafsha’s husband works in a state organization. Bunafsha has higher education. She is a teacher. She works in a local school. Bunafsha has been working in this field for more than 25 years. She has great experience in this field, and she is one of the best teachers.

Bunafsha always tries to give good quality education to her children. Now her daughter is a student in her first course and she studies well. Bunafsha is asking for a loan of 2,000 somoni to pay for the university tuition of her daughter. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to pay for the university tuition of her daughter

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José con 19 años de edad,de estado civil soltero,vive en casa familiar,junto a sus padres, en el distrito de Oyotún,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú,en una zona rural. José cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

José se dedica a brindar servicios de jornaleria,con una experiencia en el rubro hace 05 años,su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio.Solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo, compra de herramientas como son palanas, pico, etc para su trabajo esto con la finalidad de brindar mejores servicio a sus clientes.

José es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa
texts.en:
José is 19-years old. He is single and lives in his family's home with his parents in a rural area in the district of Oyotún, Chiclayo province in the department of Lambayeque, Perú. José has very good personal and work references from the residents in the area. The people who live here work mainly in agriculture, business and livestock.

José lends his services to daily labor, with an experience of 5 years in this field. His business is located in his home. He is asking for a loan to buy fixed assets, to buy tools such as shovels, pickax, etc. for his work. With this, he will be able to give a better service to his customers.

José is a new member of Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy fixed assets, to buy tools such as shovels, pickax, etc.

loans.name: Lazos Unidos Y Rumbos Distintos Group

texts.es: Máximo tiene 64 años de edad es conviviente con hijos independientes. El se dedica a la crianza de de cerdos hace dos años. Para liego expenderlos a los mercados y restaurants.  En sus tiempos libres se dedica a prestar servicios de albañilería. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de alimentos para sus cerdos. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Máximo es el segundo del lado izquierdo.
texts.en:
Máximo is 64-years old. He is married and has independent children. He has worked raising pigs for 2 years, to later sell them to the markets and restaurants. In his free time he loans his services to masonry. He will used the loan to buy food for his pigs.

The group thanks the Kiva lenders for the given loan. Máximo is the second from the left.

loans.use: to buy food for his pigs.

loans.name: Eva Nehemy

texts.es:
Eva, de 22 años de edad, estudio bachiller opción contador, no tuvo la oportunidad de seguir en la universidad debido a la situación económica, está soltera y no tiene hijos y vive con su mamá. 

Eva, desde hace 4 años se dedica a la venta de pupusas, este oficio lo aprendió con su hermana y fue ella quien la indujo a colocar este negocio, antes trabajo en un comedor pero sus ingresos no eran muchos.- Ella se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. para elaborar los preparativos para las pupusas, pero comienza a vender a las 3:00 p.m. y termina a las 6:00 p.m. 

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar una plancha industrial, comprar 4 sillas, una mesa y lo demás para comprar productos para su negocio.

Eva, sueña con poder construir un local solo para el negocio, donde también se venda comida y poder seguir estudiando en la universidad.
texts.en:
Eva, 22 years old, studied for an accounting diploma. She did not have the opportunity to continue in the university due to her economic situation. She is single and has no kids and lives with her mom.

Eva, since four years ago, makes a living selling pupusas. This profession she learned with her sister and it was her who prompted her to put up this business. Before she worked in a diner but her income was not much. She wakes up at 5:00 am to make the preparations for the pupusas but she begins to sell at 3:00 pm and finishes at 6:00 pm. 

She needs the loan to buy an industrial griddle, to buy four chairs, a table and the rest to buy products for her business.

Eva dreams with being able to build a single establishment for the business, where food will also be sold and to be able to continue studying in the university.

loans.use: to buy an industrial griddle, to buy four chairs, a table and the rest to buy products for her business.

loans.name: Tuek's Group

texts.en:
Tuek, 31, is married and has five dependent children, three of whom are in school while the other two are too young to attend school. She lives in Siem Reap province, where she and her husband have been growing rice on a one hectare area of farmland as their main source of income. To make more income, she sometimes works for her neighbors for a fee. She earns about $5 US per day and can manage to save about $2 US per day for future needs. Drought, pests and weeds are obstacles in the rice growing business.

This will be Tuek's sixth loan with VisionFund. Past loans have helped her improve her living conditions and buy household supplies for her family. As the leader of this four-member group, she is going to use her loan to buy organic fertilizer to improve her farmland. She dreams of earning more income to upgrade their standard of living and to keep sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer to improve her farmland so as to get higher returns to keep sending her children to school.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Beniamin

texts.en:
Beniamin has already had an eye surgery; however, according to what doctors are saying, things are not going well, and he must go for some more tests and stuff. "This has made me upset already because I hoped it would all come out positive. And now, not only is my vision not fixed, but I need other money. That's very upsetting for me," says Beniamin, covering his eyes behind glasses as the doctors suggested to him when he came out of surgery. "I am not doing well, and my wife is very exhausted from all the work. That's not fair at all. She's got to do everything, and for everybody including me now. I don't really want to think and talk about it ... ," continued Beniamin, ending the conversation.

This loan will be used for a visitation to an eye specialist and to repair a tractor they use in their agricultural activity.

loans.use: to pay for a visitation to an eye specialist and also pay for some repairs to a tractor they use for agriculture

loans.name: Mariela Laura

texts.es:
Mariela es una mujer de 20 años, soltera, tiene un hijo de 1 año y su negocio es la venta de artículos personales de limpieza.
Ella es buena madre, atenta y muy amable. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ’16 de julio’ donde se realiza la feria del mismo nombre que se dice ‘se puede encontrar desde una aguja hasta un camión.
Mariela es de piel morena, cabello negro largo y baja estatura, su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español por el comercio, su vida la comparte con su pequeño bebé, viven en una casa propiedad de la familia construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de artículos de limpieza personal como; champú, jaboncillo, crema de enjuague, gel para cabello, crema facial, desodorante, tinte para cabello y otros, “Además ofrezco una línea especial para pieles delicadas o sensibles...” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con variedad de productos, la desventaja es que el puesto de venta no es suyo. Su sueño es estabilizar su negocio y tener un puesto de venta propio, ella desea comprar productos de limpieza personales y refaccionar su puesto de venta. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Mariela solicita un préstamo para comprar productos de limpieza personales y refaccionar su puesto de venta.
texts.en:
Mariela is a single 20 year old woman. She has a one year old son and her business is the sale of personal hygiene products. She is a good mother, attentive and very friendly. She does her business in the '16 de julio' zone, where the fair of the same name takes place and where it is said that "you can find everything from a needle to a truck."

Mariela has tan skin, black hair, and a short stature. Her native tongue is Aymará and she speaks Spanish for business. She shares her life with her little baby. They live in a house that is the property of the family, constructed of brick with a corrugated iron roof and that has drinking water, electrical energy, and a sewage system.

Her business is the sale of personal hygiene products like shampoo, bars of soap, conditioner, hair gel, facial cream, deodorant, hair dye, and others. She comments, "I also offer a special line for delicate or sensitive skin..." The advantage of her business is that she has a variety of products. The disadvantage is that the post is not hers. Her dream is to establish her business and have a sales post of her own.

She wishes to buy personal hygiene products and remodel her sales post. This is the first sequence of loans with the institution in the 1 year that she has carried out this business. It is for these reasons that Mariela is requesting a loan to buy personal hygiene products and remodel her sales post.

loans.use: to buy personal hygiene products and remodel her sales post.

loans.name: Eldrid

texts.en:
Eldrid is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business direct selling Fuller Life and Tupperware products in the Philippines. Eldrid has been in this business for 17 years. She earns additional income from a motorcycle transport business.

Eldrid has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF). She is borrowing 10,000 Philippine pesos through NWTF to buy more products to sell to her customers in her direct selling Fuller Life and Tupperware products business. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more Fuller Life and Tupperware products to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Rizwana

texts.en: Rizwana is a house wife aged 40, and a mother of four living in the populated area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband does stone work where he cuts stones and tiles for buildings; he cuts them into required sizes and shapes, using different types of stones and tiles. They are used in making ground, walls etc. Though too much hard work and energy is consumed in this process, this is a skill not very well paid for in Pakistan. Rizwana's husband struggles to keep up with the increasing challenges, but has managed to bear all the expenses of his family. He wants to buy raw stones and tiles to shape them and sell them in the markets and to local constructors. As he does not have sufficient funds, Rizwana wants to help her husband by applying for a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan. She hopes her husband's hard work will pay off and they will eventually have a better life.

loans.use: To help her husband with his stone work

loans.name: Silvestre

texts.es:
Silvestre, de 74 años de edad, nunca asistió a la escuela debido a la pobreza de sus padres, está casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios de la casa, juntos procrearon 3 hijos que ya son mayores de edad y cada uno tiene su hogar aparte. 

Silvestre, toda su vida se dedicó a la agricultura y a la ganadería, trabajó desde muy pequeño con su padre para aprender lo que hoy sabe, tiene ganado y también cultiva la tierra y de ésta manera generar los ingresos suficientes para el sustento de los suyos.- La leche que obtiene de las vacas la procesa y vende sus derivados y su esposa le ayuda con el trabajo de ordeño y el traslado del ganado para pastarlo. 

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar una novilla, la cual cuidará para que tenga más crías y de esa manera aumentar su ganadería y la producción de leche. 

Los sueños de Silvestre, es poder seguir trabajando y dejarles una buena herencia a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Silvestre, who is 74, never attended school because of his parents' poverty. He is married; his wife is a homemaker; together they have three children who are already adults and each one has their own separate home.

For his entire life Silvestre has worked in farming and livestock. He started working with his father when he was very young, which is how he learned what he knows today. He has cattle and he also cultivates the land and in this way he is able to generate enough income to support his loved ones. He processes the milk he gets from his cows and sells the byproducts and his wife helps him with the milking work and transporting the cattle to graze.

He needs this loan to buy a heifer, which he will care for so it will have calves and thereby increase his livestock and his milk production.

Silvestre's dream is to be able to work and leave his children a good inheritance.

loans.use: to buy a heifer

loans.name: Dúo Bendición De Patzun Group

texts.es: Dúo Bendición de Patzun La señora La Señora Gladis Liceth de 47 años de edad es casada tiene 2 hijos vive en jocotenango su esposo es carpintero y ella lo ayuda ellos elaboran sillas, mesas y todo articulo relacionado con madera los dos trabajan juntos ya que sus hijos son pequeños aun y viven con sus suegros entonces ellos trabajan fuerte para ahorrar y en el futuro ellos puedan tener una casa propia y seguir trabajando para dar estudio a sus hijos, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de mubles.
texts.en: Dúo Bendición de Patzun: Gladis Liceth is 47 years old. She is married, has two chiildren and lives in Jocotenango. Her husband is a carpenter and she helps him. They make chairs, tables, and all wood related articles. The two of them work together since their children are still small and they live with their in-laws, so they work hard to save and so that in the future they will be able to have their own house and keep working to educate their children. She is requesting this loan to buy raw materials for the production of furniture.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for the production of furniture.

loans.name: Claudio

texts.es:
Claudio con 27 años de edad,de estado civil soltero,vive en casa familiar,junto a su abuela, en el distrito de Cayaltí,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Claudio se dedica a la venta de pescado como toyo,bonito,caballa,etc y mariscos,desde hace 02 años con experiencia en el rubro.Su negocio está ubicado en el interior del mercado de Cayaltí. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más cantidad de pescado y mariscos, ya que cuenta con más clientela.De esta manera le facilitará obtener mayores ingresos.

Claudio si cuenta con experiencia crediticia, es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Claudio is 27 years old, single, and lives in his family home with his grandmother in the district of Cayaltí, Chiclayo Province, Lambayeque Department, in the country of Peru. The residents of this town mostly work in farming, commerce, and livestock.


Claudio has sold fish, such as dogfish, bonito, chub mackerel, etc. and seafood, for two years with experience in the profession. His business is located in the inland market of Cayaltí. He is requesting this loan to buy a larger quantity of fish and seafood, as he has more customers. This will allow him to make better income.

Claudio has experience as a borrower; he is a new member of Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of fish and seafood.
